title: iMetal Resources Gets Ready for Next Phase of Drilling at Gowganda West Gold Project
text: “What we're looking to really confirm here … is whether Gowganda West is a continuation of the known, multimillion-ounce Juby deposit, or if we have new discoveries, new gold trends that are actually on our property," said iMetal Resources President and CEO Saf Dhillon.

relationships.passage: "iMetal Resources Gets Ready for Next Phase of Drilling at Gowganda West Gold Project"
